title: Spack install mpich even if it is specified in packages.yaml
body:
Here is simple example:

I have specified `mpich` as an external package in `packages.yaml` :

``` bash
    mpich:
        paths:
            mpich@3.2%gcc@6.2.0: /usr/local
        version: [3.2]
```

(I didn't specify buildable false because I want to build it with clang compiler).

Now lets look at `HDF5` spec:

```
spack spec hdf5 +mpi %gcc
Input spec
------------------------------
  hdf5%gcc+mpi

Normalized
------------------------------
  hdf5%gcc+mpi
      ^mpi
      ^zlib@1.1.2:

Concretized
------------------------------
  hdf5@1.10.0-patch1%gcc@6.2.0+cxx~debug~fortran+mpi+shared~szip~threadsafe arch=darwin-elcapitan-x86_64
      ^mpich@3.2%gcc@6.2.0+hydra+pmi+romio~verbs arch=darwin-elcapitan-x86_64
      ^zlib@1.2.8%gcc@6.2.0 arch=darwin-elcapitan-x86_64
```

If I try install above `mpich` then:

``` bash
spack install --fake mpich@3.2%gcc@6.2.0+hydra+pmi+romio~verbs arch=darwin-elcapitan-x86_64
==> mpich is externally installed in /usr/local
```

Which is expected behaviour. Now if I try to install `HDF5`, it builds `mpich`:

``` bash
spack install --fake hdf5 +mpi %gcc
==> Installing hdf5
==> Installing mpich
==> Building mpich
==> Successfully installed mpich
  Fetch: .  Build: 0.12s.  Total: 0.12s.
[+] /Users/kumbhar/workarena/software/sources/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/gcc-6.2.0/mpich-3.2-vawupusw7g7zwadhoaqfefzyizosh2ml
==> zlib is already installed in /Users/kumbhar/workarena/software/sources/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/gcc-6.2.0/zlib-1.2.8-fbuurtffrrl7o2h5q4vnf7dgf67bo7au
==> Building hdf5
==> Successfully installed hdf5
  Fetch: .  Build: 0.29s.  Total: 0.29s.
[+] /Users/kumbhar/workarena/software/sources/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/gcc-6.2.0/hdf5-1.10.0-patch1-3mx2kc2rcd52gkysod5k2vccsj4m6f4u
```

Why it's building `mpich`? If I explicitly specify `mpich` dependency  then it doesn't :

``` bash
spack install --fake hdf5 +mpi %gcc ^mpich
==> Installing hdf5
==> mpich is externally installed in /usr/local
==> zlib is already installed in /Users/kumbhar/workarena/software/sources/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/gcc-6.2.0/zlib-1.2.8-fbuurtffrrl7o2h5q4vnf7dgf67bo7au
==> Building hdf5
==> Successfully installed hdf5
  Fetch: .  Build: 0.29s.  Total: 0.29s.
[+] /Users/kumbhar/workarena/software/sources/spack/opt/spack/darwin-elcapitan-x86_64/gcc-6.2.0/hdf5-1.10.0-patch1-3mx2kc2rcd52gkysod5k2vccsj4m6f4u
==> Warning: Dependency missing due to corrupt install directory:
  /usr/local
  Install prefix exists but contains no spec.yaml:
      /usr/local
```

Am I missing anything? (recent concretisation issue #2068)
